name: Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil
goal: RSPO is a not-for-profit that unites stakeholders from the 7 sectors of the palm oil industry: oil palm producers, processors or traders, consumer goods manufacturers, retailers, banks/investors, and environmental and social non-governmental organisations (NGOs), to develop and implement global standards for sustainable palm oil.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives: The RSPO follows EU activites related to palm oil and other deforestation-risk commodities, including the European Commission's action plan on deforestation and related activities in the Parliament.
